price: Baranavuga bati “Rwose ntimuzareke imana zanyu, kandi ntimuzareke (kugaragira) Wadan, Suwa’a, Yagutha, Ya’uqa ndetse na Nasra[1]
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَا تَذَرُنَّ ءَالِهَتَكُمۡ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدّٗا وَلَا سُوَاعٗا وَلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسۡرٗا
footnotes: [1] Ayo yari amazina y’ibigirwamana abantu ba Nuhu basengaga.

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: waqālū lā tadharunna ālihatakum walā tadharunna waddan walā suwāʿan walā yaghūtha wayaʿūqa wanasran
